response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high quality and unique features, I estimate its value to be around $150 to me. Considering its worth and the benefits it can provide, I'm offering it to you for $120. This price offers a great value for you while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.", "product_price": 120}
